description: Detects the creation of a suspicious ADS (Alternate Data Stream) file by software other than browsers
author: frack113
false_positives: Other legitimate browsers not currently included in the filter (please add them)
Legitimate downloads via scripting or command-line tools (Investigate to determine if it's legitimate)
name: Creation Of a Suspicious ADS File Outside a Browser Download
query: ((Contents:\[ZoneTransfer\]\ \ ZoneId\=3* AND file.path.text:"*\:Zone.Identifier" AND file.path.text:("*.exe*" OR "*.scr*" OR "*.bat*" OR "*.cmd*" OR "*.docx*" OR "*.hta*" OR "*.jse*" OR "*.lnk*" OR "*.pptx*" OR "*.ps*" OR "*.reg*" OR "*.sct*" OR "*.vb*" OR "*.wsc*" OR "*.wsf*" OR "*.xlsx*")) AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:"*\\brave.exe") OR (process.executable.text:("C:\Program Files\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe" OR "C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe")) OR (process.executable.text:("C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" OR "C:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe")) OR (process.executable.text:("C:\Program Files (x86)\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" OR "C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe")) OR (process.executable.text:"*\\maxthon.exe") OR (((process.executable.text:"C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Microsoft\\EdgeWebView\\Application\\*") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\WindowsApps\\MicrosoftEdge.exe") OR (process.executable.text:("C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\Edge\Application\msedge.exe" OR "C:\Program Files\Microsoft\Edge\Application\msedge.exe")))) OR ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Microsoft\\EdgeCore\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\\Microsoft\\EdgeCore\\*") AND process.executable.text:("*\\msedge.exe" OR "*\\msedgewebview2.exe"))) OR (process.executable.text:"*\\opera.exe") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\safari.exe") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\seamonkey.exe") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\vivaldi.exe") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\whale.exe") OR ((process.executable.text:"C\:\\Program\ Files\\WindowsApps\\Microsoft.ScreenSketch_*" AND process.executable.text:"*\\SnippingTool\\SnippingTool.exe" AND file.path.text:"C\:\\Users\\*" AND file.path.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Packages\\Microsoft.ScreenSketch_*" AND file.path.text:"*\\TempState\\Screenshot\ *" AND file.path.text:"*.png\:Zone.Identifier")))))
